title: George R.R. Martin - Westeros Collection
description:
This is a collection of books by author <a href ="http://http://www.georgerrmartin.com/">George R.R. Martin</a> 

It consists of the series of books that spawned the HBO hit TV series <a href="http://www.hbo.com/#/game-of-thrones">Game of Thrones</a>

<h3>A Song of Ice and Fire</h3>
1) A Game of Thrones
2) A Clash of Kings
3) A Storm of Swords
4) A Feast for Crows
5) A Dance with Dragons

Also included is Tales of Dunk and Egg a series of novellas written by Martin, set in the same world as Song of Ice and Fire - roughly 90 years before the events of Game of Thrones take place. 

<h3>Tales of Dunk and Egg</h3>
1) The Hedge Knight
2) The Sworn Sword
3) The Mystery Knight

All books are in epub format, for conversion to other formats or to manage your ebook library check out </a href="http://http://calibre-ebook.com/">Calibre E-Book Management</a>

Initial speeds will be slow, my bandwidth is terrible, but I will seed for as long as I can, but please make sure you seed as well!

Happy reading, and don't forget to show your appreciation in the comments, and by seeding this thing till the Seven bloody hells freeze over! ;)

Enjoy
